original_text:
Lotus Luck
L’India è un Paese che incuriosisce per la sua bellezza e per la spiritualità che si respira tra le strade.
La World Match gli rende omaggio con Lotus Luck, una slot dal gameplay molto rilassante, priva di grandi animazioni e di funzioni speciali, adatta soprattutto per chi è alla ricerca di un gioco classico senza regole complicate.
Il punto di forza di questa slot è di sicuro la grafica super dettagliata. Dai simboli alla griglia di gioco, non c’è dettaglio che sia stato trascurato. I rulli sono incorniciati nell’oro e sullo sfondo si intravede un palazzo reale circondato da uno specchio d’acqua limpidissima.
La musica ha un sapore mistico dall’effetto altamente rilassante, tutto a beneficio di una giocata senza pensieri.
Caratteristiche della slot
Griglia classica con 5 rulli e 4 righe e ben 1.024 modi per vincere.
Le combinazioni paganti sono formate da un minimo di 2 simboli identici e adiacenti, a partire da sinistra verso destra. La puntata va da 0,80 € sino a un massimo di 160 € e attraverso il simbolo del dollaro è possibile selezionare la puntata massima in un colpo solo.
Si possono impostare da un minimo di 5 giri automatici a un massimo di 1.000 ma anche all’infinito. Per fermarli, basterà cliccare sul tasto stop. È presente la funzione Turbo.
Il valore RTP è del 95,62%, la volatilità media, buon compromesso tra somme vinte e frequenza delle combinazioni vincenti.
Simboli e funzionalità
Cominciamo parlando delle carte della scala reale, dal 10 all’asso. Per avere una combinazione vincente è necessario affiancare almeno 3 simboli identici. Sebbene si tratti di vincite di basso livello, le somme sono comunque interessanti, soprattutto quando si allineano 5 simboli.
Cifre leggermente più alte quando si tratta di simboli tematici, che tra le altre cose pagano anche con soli 2 simboli. Partendo da quello di minor valore a salire, troviamo la candela, il piatto con il cibo, il fiore di loto, il vaso colmo di monete d’oro e il copricapo.
Il gufo è il simbolo Wild, ha funzione di Jolly e sostituisce tutti i simboli tranne lo Scatter, quest’ultimo rappresentato dalla regina. Con 3 simboli si vincono 8 Free Spins, con 4 i giri gratuiti saranno 12 e con 5 ne avremo 16.
Se durante i Free Spin compaiono ulteriori Scatter, la funzione può essere riattivata.
Considerazioni finali
Partiamo subito dicendo che a noi la slot della World Match è piaciuto per almeno tre motivi. Innanzitutto, la cura con cui si è lavorato al comparto grafico ci suggerisce l’idea di trovarci di fronte a un ottimo prodotto di fattura pregevole.
Il secondo aspetto positivo è la fluidità di gioco. Lotus Luck non ha bisogno di molta CPU e il computer non ha mai crashato o rallentato durante gli Spin.
Il terzo motivo è il gameplay semplice. Ci rendiamo conto che al giorno d’oggi l’offerta di slot è molto ampia e che per evitare la ripetitività di un prodotto bisogna escogitare soluzioni sempre nuove. Se però questo vuol dire perdere tempo a capire quando si vince e quando no, o a leggere pagine e pagine di istruzioni, allora preferiamo andare sul sicuro.
Un punto a sfavore, se così si può chiamare, è la poca fluidità con cui abbiamo consultato la tabella dei pagamenti. Non c’è una barra a scorrimento e abbiamo avuto non pochi problemi a scorrere l’intera pagina. Un peccato veniale che di fronte alla qualità generale ci sentiamo di perdonare senza indugi.

raw_translation.response:
Lotus Luck

India is a country that fascinated us with its beauty and spirituality on the streets. World Match pays homage to it with Lotus Luck, a slot game with a soothing gameplay, without grand animations or special functions, suitable for those who seek a classic game without complicated rules. The strength of this slot is the super-detailed graphics, with no detail overlooked from symbols to game grid. The reels are framed in gold and the background shows a royal palace surrounded by crystal-clear water. The mystical background music creates a relaxing effect, all leading to a carefree gaming experience.

Game features

Classic grid with 5 reels and 4 rows with up to 1,024 ways to win. Winning combinations are formed with a minimum of 2 identical and adjacent symbols from left to right. Bets range from €0.80 to a maximum of €160, and the dollar symbol allows for maximum bets in one click. You can set from a minimum of 5 automatic spins up to a maximum of 1,000 or infinity. The stop button will stop the automatic spins. The Turbo function is also available. 

The RTP value is 95.62% with medium volatility, a good compromise of winning amounts and frequency of winning combinations.

Symbols and functions

Let's start with the royal flush cards from 10 to Ace. At least 3 identical symbols are required for a winning combination. Although these are low-level wins, the sums are still interesting, especially when 5 symbols are aligned. The themed symbols pay slightly higher and can also pay even with only 2 symbols. Starting from the lowest value, we have a candle, a plate of food, a lotus flower, a vase filled with gold coins and a headpiece.

The owl is the Wild symbol, acting as a substitute for all symbols except for the Scatter, represented by the queen. With 3 symbols, you win 8 Free Spins, with 4, there are 12 and with 5, there are 16 free spins. If additional Scatters appear during Free Spins, the function can be reactivated.

Final thoughts

Firstly, we loved the World Match slot game for at least three reasons. The first is the attention to detail in the graphics, suggesting excellent craftsmanship. Secondly, the game is fast and stable, with no crashes or slowdowns during spins. Thirdly, it has simple gameplay. We understand that the offering of slot games is extensive, but to avoid repetition, new solutions are always needed. However, if it means wasting time figuring out when you win and when you don't, or reading pages and pages of instructions, we prefer to play it safe.

One downside, if it can be called that, is the lack of smoothness while consulting the paytable. There is no scrolling bar, and we had some trouble navigating the entire page. Nonetheless, we completely forgive this minor flaw due to its overall quality.

Review: Lotus Luck

India is a country of unparalleled beauty and spirituality that exudes from its streets. The slot game, Lotus Luck, by World Match pays homage to this country with a gameplay that is incredibly relaxing. It is free from any excessive animations or complicated rules, perfect for those who are searching for a classic game.

The game's biggest strength lies in its incredibly detailed graphics. From the symbols to the game board, no detail is overlooked. The golden reels are framed by a royal palace surrounded by the clearest water one could imagine. The mystical music adds to the relaxing and carefree gameplay.

Slot Features

The slot has a classic 5 reel, 4 row layout with 1,024 ways to win. Winning combinations require a minimum of 2 adjacent, identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel to the right. Bets range from €0.80 up to a maximum of €160. The dollar symbol allows for the selection of maximum bet in one go.

The game has the option to set 5 to 1,000 automatic spins, or even infinite. The Turbo function is available as well. The RTP value is 95.62% with medium volatility, a good compromise between the value of wins and frequency of winning combinations.

Symbols and Functions

To begin with, the slot has Royal Flush cards from 10 to Ace. Winning combinations require at least 3 adjacent, identical symbols. While they are low-value winnings, the sums are still generous, especially when 5 symbols align.

The themed symbols offer slightly higher winnings and also pay out with only 2 symbols. Starting from the lowest value to the highest, they include a candle, a plate of food, a lotus flower, a vase filled with gold coins, and a headdress.

An owl is the Wild symbol, it acts as a substitute for all symbols except for the Scatter, which is represented by a queen. With 3 symbols, 8 free spins are won, 4 symbols and there will be 12 free spins, and with 5 symbols, there will be 16 free spins. If additional Scatters appear during the free spins, the feature may be reactivated.

Final Thoughts

Firstly, we enjoyed the high-quality and careful work on the graphics. This suggests that the product is a premium and excellent one. The second positive aspect is the smooth gameplay. Lotus Luck does not require a lot of CPU power and the computer has never crashed or slowed down during spins. The third reason is the simple gameplay. Nowadays, there are multiple slot games available and to avoid the repetitiveness, new solutions must be devised. However, if this means taking time to understand winning combinations and reading through endless pages of instructions, then it is best to play it safe.

One negative point is the lack of fluidity when viewing the payment table. There is no scrolling bar, and we had some trouble scrolling through the entire page. A minor issue that we can overlook given the overall quality of the game.

The game has an RTP value of 95.62% with medium volatility, providing a good balance between the value of wins and frequency of winning combinations.

Design and Sound

Lotus Luck features incredibly detailed graphics paying homage to the beauty of India. The game board and symbols are exquisitely designed, with no detail overlooked. The golden reels are framed by a royal palace surrounded by serene waters. The relaxing and carefree gameplay is complemented by mystical music that transports players to another world.

Volatility and RTP

Lotus Luck has an RTP value of 95.62% and medium volatility, making it a good compromise between the value of wins and frequency of winning combinations. Players can place bets ranging from €0.80 up to a maximum of €160.

Symbol Features

Lotus Luck features 10 to Ace Royal Flush cards as its lowest paying symbols, while the themed symbols pay out slightly higher winnings. The symbols, in ascending order of value, include a candle, a plate of food, a lotus flower, a vase filled with gold coins, and a headdress. An owl is the Wild symbol and substitutes for all symbols except for the Scatter, which is represented by a queen. Three Scatter symbols trigger 8 free spins, 4 symbols trigger 12 free spins, and 5 symbols trigger 16 free spins, with the possibility of reactivating the feature if more Scatters appear during the free spins.

However, the lack of fluidity when viewing the payment table may be a minor issue for some players, as there is no scrolling bar, making it challenging to scroll through the entire page.
